channel.title: Admins dont have the ability to trade on a p server
channel.description:
[b]Note:[/b] If you do not know what i am requesting dont bother posting please.. READ THIS CAREFULLY.. Look at what i am asking, "Need a TUT, or a code so they dont have the ability to trade". If you do not know.. then dont post, DO NOT POST Telling me idiotic crap about "Just tell ur mods not to", Well... heres 1 thing, I have confidence in them.. but i do not trust them 100%. Thank-You...
Well, I dont like it when my administrators Trade, so whats the probability of a code that i can perhaps quilify with, if you can monitor for me please, And thank-You again for your cooperation. And i promice if you ever join my server, I will reward you with a great chance of approval :)

item.title: Admins dont have the ability to trade on a p server

And I need help, someone thanks!
